name: sepia

Less common colours
having a reddish-brown colour, like that of an old photograph: Barry was fascinated by an old sepia photograph of his father at four years old. The design on the man's hand showed up clearly, despite the sepia tint of the old photo.
More examplesFewer examplesOne frame holds aged photos in sepia tones.The camera was loaded with film that produced only brown sepia images.The hollows under her cheekbones were sepia.
